patthana18.29:4.1: Saraṇaṃ dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.29:4.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana18.29:5.1: Araṇaṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naaraṇo nanadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.29:6.1: Araṇaṃ sauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasaraṇo nasauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.29:7.1: Araṇaṃ anuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.29:7.2: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
